title: The building is located a short walk (.5 mile) from UW
posting_body: On-site tenants are greeted with beautiful cedar siding with a fresh coat of paint.
Upon entering the building through our Door King System immediately to your right there is a fully functional gym with ample equipment and rubber flooring.
If you are looking to relax look no further than our secured rooftop featuring new furniture and two propane grills!
Residents will have access to new washers and dryers in-unit (free).
Studios at Nors will come equipped with a two burner stovetop, microwave, full-size fridge, deep sinks, and in-unit Centurylink modems.
Units come furnished with a full-size bed, bedframe, table, chairs, and clothing rack for no additional cost!
Fully furnished options available upon request.
The building is located a short walk (.5 mile) from the University of Detroit Mercy!
It's also located a few blocks from the core of the most vibrant neighborhoods in detroit, University District, and only a short bus ride or bike from metro  Hill,
